description: Create new event that overlaps with an existing calendar event. Tests that the system creates anyway when speakers acknowledge the conflict.

events.title: Product Demo
events.reasoning: Alice wants to schedule a product demo on Wednesday at 2 PM. Both speakers acknowledge this conflicts with the existing Design Review [1] but agree the demo takes priority. Duration is 45 minutes as specified.

mock_llm_response.summary: Created product demo for Wednesday at 2 PM (knowingly conflicts with design review).

notes: Reference datetime is Monday 2026-02-16, so 'Wednesday' resolves to 2026-02-18. Event [1] (design review) overlaps but should NOT be deleted or updated - just a new create.
